title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.1 - Reasonable speed required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.1 - Reasonable speed required

State Regulations

No person shall drive a motor vehicle on any portion of the
vehicular crossing at a speed greater than is reasonable and prudent under the
conditions and having regard to the actual and potential hazards then
existing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
